messages.content:
Please analyze the following Dallas Cowboys 2024 schedule and create an event for each game using the create_event_tool. For each game, extract the following information:

1. Title (e.g., "Cowboys vs [Opponent]")
2. Description (including the week number and whether it's preseason or regular season)
3. Start date (in MM/DD/YYYY format)
4. Start time (in HH:MM format, converted to 24-hour time)
5. Location

Call the create_event_tool for each game with the appropriate information. After processing all games, provide a summary of how many events were created.

Here's the schedule:


<content>

tools.name: get_web_site_from_url
tools.description: If you add urls to a prompt and ask the llm to get the web site using the url(s) you give it

tools.name: search_the_web
tools.description: Search the web for a topic ONLY if the user asks for web search

tools.name: create_event_tool
tools.description: If the user needs to create an event this tool help

start_date.description: The start date no time just date mm/dd/yyyy

start_time.description: The time can be hh:mm and can be null of all day

end_date.description: The end date no time just date mm/dd/yyyy if all day leave null

end_time.description: The time can be hh:mm and can be null of all day

all_day.description: Boolean if the event is all day

location.description: Can be any amount if info location name, street etc

assigned_to_assistant.description: If it is a task you the assistant will need to do then set this as true
